projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio and CV website built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Features responsive design, JSON-based content management, and automated GitHub Pages deployment.

projects.description: Full-stack task management application with real-time collaboration features. Supports drag-and-drop boards, team workspaces, and activity tracking.
